settings.info: This filter contains such choices as default, best selling, alphabetically:A-Z, alphabetically:Z-A, price:low to high, price: high to low, date: new to old, date: old to new

settings.label: Collection for sorting
settings.info: Type in exact collection names to be included in the filter. All collections are separated by comma

settings.info: Type in tags to be included in the filter. All tags are separated by comma

settings.info: HTML is allowed

settings.label: Enable using of cookies
settings.info: If true, after opening of notification button, script makes a record in the cookie and the button won't show to the customer after page refresh.

settings.label: Unique identifier
settings.info: Unique identifier helps to show new messages when option "using of cookies" is enabled. Change it when you want to show a new message.

settings.label: Delay of showing
settings.info: Time in milliseconds

settings.content: If your customer is logged-in, the country in his default shipping address will be selected. If you are not sure about the  spelling to use here, refer to the first checkout page.

settings.label: Enable currency conversion
settings.info: Even though prices are displayed in different currencies, orders will still be processed in your store's currency.

settings.label: Supported currencies
settings.default: INR GBP CAD USD AUD EUR JPY
settings.info: Use the country's ISO [currency code](http://www.xe.com/iso4217.php). Separate your currency codes with a space.

settings.content: This area allows you make style changes of the theme beyond the default theme settings. Just insert required CSS rules in the text area below. We encourage you to make CSS customizations here to save them from being overwritten after future updates ⚙️

settings.label: Your CSS styles here 👇
settings.info: CSS rules applied in this textarea will overwrite any Foodly CSS rules that have the same property and are applied to the same selectors

settings.label: Custom CSS File name here 👇
settings.info: Download your custom CSS file from admin panel [Settings/Files](http://www.shopify.com/admin/settings/files) and type file name above
